constantValues: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.

members.name: authoredOn

constantValues: Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests.

members.description: Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests.

members.name: contextType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated.

members.description: The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'contextType_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'contextType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: contextType_display

members.name: description

constantValues: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.

members.description: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.

members.name: groupIdentifier

constantValues: The business identifier of the logical ""grouping"" request/order that this referral is a part of.

members.description: The business identifier of the logical ""grouping"" request/order that this referral is a part of.

members.name: intent

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Distinguishes the "level" of authorization/demand implicit in this request.

members.description: Distinguishes the "level" of authorization/demand implicit in this request.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'intent_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'intent'
addSupportingAttribute.name: intent_display

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: occurencePeriodEndDate

constantValues: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing.

members.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing.

members.name: occurrenceDate

constantValues: The period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur.

members.description: The period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur.

members.name: occurrenceType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The type of the period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur.

members.description: The type of the period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'occurrenceType_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'occurrenceType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: occurrenceType_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: practitionerSpecialtyId

constantValues: Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent. For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent. For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology.

members.name: priority

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

members.description: An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'priority_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'priority'
addSupportingAttribute.name: priority_display

members.name: referralRequestNumber

constantValues: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

members.description: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

members.name: requesterAgent

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The device, practitioner, etc. who initiated the request.

members.description: The device, practitioner, etc. who initiated the request.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'requesterAgent_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'requesterAgent'
addSupportingAttribute.name: requesterAgent_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterAgentDeviceId

constantValues: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterAgentOrganizationId

constantValues: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action. Includes companies, institutions, corporations, departments.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action. Includes companies, institutions, corporations, departments.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterAgentPatientId

constantValues: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterAgentPractitionerId

constantValues: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterAgentRelatedPersonId

constantValues: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: requesterOnBehalfOfId

constantValues: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.explanation: Unique identifier of the requestor for the item.
foreignKeyAttribute.name: requestorId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the requestor for the item.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the requestor for the item.

members.name: status

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record.

members.description: The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'status_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'status'
addSupportingAttribute.name: status_display

members.name: subject

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

members.description: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'subject_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'subject'
addSupportingAttribute.name: subject_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: subjectContextEncounterId

constantValues: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: subjectContextEpisodeOfCareId

constantValues: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: subjectGroupId

constantValues: Represents a defined collection of entities that may be discussed or acted upon collectively but which are not expected to act collectively and are not formally or legally recognized.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Represents a defined collection of entities that may be discussed or acted upon collectively but which are not expected to act collectively and are not formally or legally recognized.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: subjectPatientId

constantValues: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: typeId

constantValues: An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Referral Request

members.description: Reason for the status of the Referral Request

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'ReferralRequest' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

definitions.description: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.
